subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: A 27-year-old Grammy and Emmy Award winner and former member of ’N Sync, Justin Timberlake plays golf to a 6 handicap and is building a course in Memphis.
snippet: A 27-year-old Grammy and Emmy Award winner and former member of ’N Sync, Justin Timberlake plays golf to a 6 handicap and is building a course in Memphis.
